title: cheese dressing
description: This easy and tasty warm salad is packed with rich ingredients that turn it into a sensational starter.
ingredients: 1 head Romaine lettuce (or similar firm, crisp lettuce), root trimmed, leaves cut into 2.5cm/1in thick slices
50g/1¾ozmild, creamy blue cheese such as St Agur, roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
